channel.title: RSPS like Inotia
channel.description:
I was trying to think of a way to write my rsps. I don't want it to be played like RuneScape and I want to to be my own story line, combat systems, skilling, etc. So, I ran across this game:
[youtube]https://youtu.be/TDYvmeO6K_4[/youtube]
What do you guys think of an rsps being similar to the game above? I would actually like ideas on what would be very attractive to you in a rsps.

item.title: RSPS like Inotia
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

Personally wouldn’t ever play something remotely close to this. I barely play any more but I think I can speak for quite a few when I say that runescape is the underlying reason that rsps are played, and if rsps wasn’t based on rs or didn’t have the rs feel, then I wouldn’t play.

Simply too much to learn and the efforts of learning a new game, especially something complex like an mmo definitely wouldn’t be worth the time

Read full topic
